```{r setup, include=FALSE}

source("RSS_functions.R")
```



```{r, include=FALSE}
flag=0

my_feed <- "https://rss.arxiv.org/rss/cs.LG"

initial_results <- most_recent(my_feed)
result <- tryCatch(initial_results) # Catch error when no results

paste("tryCatch: ", result) #Shows result of retrieval

# Sets flag = 1 when no records retrieved

if (is.null(result)) {
  flag=1
  cat("Sorry, no papers published today\n")
} else {paste("Records Retrieved:", result)}


```


::: column-page

```{r, echo=FALSE}
## Call function most_recent from loaded functions in setup
 ## Call function most_recent from loaded functions in setup
if (!flag) {
  DT::datatable(suppressMessages(initial_results), filter = 'top', escape = FALSE, rownames = FALSE,
    options = list(
   search = list(regex = TRUE, caseInsensitive = TRUE),  
   pageLength = 10,
    lengthMenu = c(10, 25, 50, 100, 200),
    autowidth = TRUE,
    columnDefs = list(list(width = '80%', targets = list(2)))
   )
  )}
```
